body_html: Not with the current op interface. You would have to write a new op that takes the kernel size as an input tensor. The kernel implementation can be refactored to use most of the current max_pool implementation.
body_text: Not with the current op interface. You would have to write a new op that takes the kernel size as an input tensor. The kernel implementation can be refactored to use most of the current max_pool implementation.
body: Not with the current op interface. You would have to write a new op that takes the kernel size as an input tensor. The kernel implementation can be refactored to use most of the current max_pool implementation.
